pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Exposure-Response Analysis Tools // Suite of tools that facilitate exposure-response analysis using Bayesian methods. The package provides a streamlined workflow for fitting types of models that are commonly used in exposure-response analysis - linear and Emax for continuous endpoints, logistic linear and logistic Emax for binary endpoints, as well as performing simulation and visualization. Learn more about the workflow at https://genentech.github.io/BayesERbook/.
